name: Darren Cooper
description:
I’m big-hearted, generous. Special warmhearted, very sweet, tender, highly affectionate, attentive. A real man that treats a woman as a Queen. Full hearted effective listener, and enormous emotional supporter. Inspirational, greatly mystique, intelligent, intellectual, understanding. Very serious in giving the best of care. Chivalrous, discerning, purposeful, down to earth. A born romantic, sensual, deeply passionate. Special charming. A man of commitment. God fearing, Family oriented, forward sincere, faithful.
I seek a Real woman of maturity/class. She must be extremely warmhearted and kind-hearted. Self-confident, stable minded, positive. One woman for only One man. I seek mutual high-level respect. I am seeking someday soonest possible to be in a something monogamous. Lasting, alive, in strength, trust, unity ( two become as one). I have the greatest full heart to give back in support, love, etc. Seeking much the same. Also a lifetime partner and real companion to share and be that main part in each and every moment of life. Healthy communication is vital. I am not into games…
